amendment.description: To authorize research and educational activities relating to Native Hawaiian law.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3783 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3783 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S9993; text: CR S9993) To authorize research and educational activities relating to Native Hawaiian law.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3783 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Inouye.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3783 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
